replies.author: 基努
replies.txt_content:
童话113 发表于 2020-5-3 18:11
并没有我就是放在permissions了
那你permissions里面怎么有
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
这两个不是权限是继承组
/mangaddp builder plots.auto

replies.author: 基努
replies.txt_content: ？？权限你放错地方了吧？发出完整的权限组配置

replies.author: 童话113
replies.txt_content:
吃屎竹 发表于 2020-5-3 18:07
？？权限你放错地方了吧？
GM里面不对吗

replies.author: 基努
replies.txt_content:
童话113 发表于 2020-5-3 18:08
GM里面不对吗 
  新玩家:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -core.cmd.back
    - -core.spawn.新手
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
复制代码

replies.txt_content:

你怕不是放错地方了permissions那里才是权限
inheritance是继承组
